title: i wish all the players and riot a very merry christmas and hopefully another excellent year
body: have a happy holidays and look forward to 2015, should be another cracker year.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Feyris Nyannyan,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=TuVcq3K1,comment-id=,timestamp=2014-12-24T23:55:29.269+0000)
>
> have a happy holidays and look forward to 2015, should be another **cracker** year.

That's offensive to white people.
**You're** offensive to most people, you have no right to judge.
